name: api_credits-consumption_get_collection
description: Retrieves the collection of CreditsConsumption resources.

properties[].description: Allows you to reduce the response to contain only the properties you need. If your desired property is nested, you can address it using nested arrays. Example: properties[]={propertyName}&properties[]={anotherPropertyName}&properties[{nestedPropertyParent}][]={nestedProperty}

$block: The CreditsConsumption resource is a chronological record of all the credits that have been consumed, including the reason for the consumption.

$ul: **createdAt**: When the resource instance was created. This date-time is in the UTC timezone.
**creditsConsumptionEventCode**: The type of event that consumed the credits.
**creditsConsumptionNotes**: Notes that add additional information to the resource.
**creditsEventId**: The ID of the event (Ping resource or AlertLog resource) that consumed the credits.
**creditsEventIri**: The IRI of the event that is related to this resource.
**creditsUsed**: The number of credits that were consumed.
**id**: The unique identifier of the resource instance.
